name: Fullstack E-Commerce Website
keyFeatures: CRUD operations, post creation, liking and commenting on posts, user follow/unfollow, pagination, keyword-based filtering, markdown support, email-based authentication, role-based authorization, and admin panel for user and content management.
technologies: Java, Spring Boot, Spring Security, React JS,Bootstrap CSS, MySQL, Postman API client, Spring tool suite, VS code.

name: Travel Blog Website
keyFeatures: Decoupled frontend and backend, REST API communication, CRUD operations, email-based authentication, role-based authorization, category-based filtering, shopping cart, order tracking, product review, and rating.
technologies: Java, Spring Boot, Spring Security, JavaScript,Thymeleaf template, Bootstrap CSS, MySQL, Spring tool suite.

name: Algorithm Visualizer
keyFeatures: Visualization of sorting algorithms, backtracking problems (Sudoku), BFS and DFS traversal, recursion problem (Tower of Hanoi), and dynamic programming problem (Longest Common Subsequence).

name: News Website
keyFeatures: “No-reload UI”, News updates, Searching & filtering based on news category, news channel, etc., On-demand weather report.
technologies: Bootstrap, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, ExpressJS, News API from newsapi.org and Weather API from openweathermap.org.
